Package com.camerontec.catalys.server.management

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ObjectNameBuilder.IObjectNameConvertable  
    ObjectNameBuilder.IQueryableNameBuilder  
    ObjectNameBuilder.ISpecificNameBuilder  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseDelegatingMBeanServerConnection
    Base class to make delegation less painful.
    JMXManagementService
    This service is in charge of exposing the JMX management interface of the Catalys Server to the LMA.
    Messages  
    ObjectNameBuilder
    Constructs ObjectNames in a less procedural fashion.
    ObjectNameBuilder.GenericServerSubType  
    ObjectNameBuilder.LocalHostBuilder
    Builder for ObjectNames that will be used / registered locally.
    ObjectNameBuilder.NamedHostBuilder
    A builder for a named host : the ObjectName properties are altered as a result of the cascading process in the LMA / MA.
    ObjectNameBuilder.ServerBuilder
    TODO : there's significant duplication between the HostBuilder, the ServerSubTypeBuilder and this class.
    ObjectNameBuilder.ServerSubTypeBuilder
    Use this class to register ObjectNames that are a descendant of the Server.
    ObjectNameBuilder.SessionBuilder  
    ObjectNameBuilder.TimeRecordBuilder  
    ObjectNameBuilder.TransportBuilder  
    RuntimeMBeanRegistrar
    Utility class that registers all MBeans of a Catalys Server.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AttributeNameEnum
    Represents magic strings for certain attributes.
    ObjectNamesEnum
    A centralised location of names to be used in the construction of ObjectName objects.
    ObjectNameTypeEnum
    Represents type information to be used in the construction of an ObjectName.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidJMXManagementServiceConfigurationException
    Instances of this exception are thrown to indicate that an error has been detected in the configuration of the JMX management service, which prevents this service from starting.
    JMXManagementServiceActivationException
    Instances of this runtime exception are thrown to indicate that an error has occurred during the activation of the JMX management service.
    JMXManagementServiceInternalErrorException
    Instances of this runtime exception are thrown to indicate that an internal error has occurred in the JMX management service, which prevents this service from starting.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    MXBeanAttributeDescriptor
    Descriptor of MXBean configuration attribute.
    MXBeanDefaultAttributeValueDescriptor  
    MXBeanLegalAttributeValuesDescriptor  
    MXBeanMaxAttributeValueDescriptor  
    MXBeanMinAttributeValueDescriptor
